channel.title: CVE Feed for The Openstack Foundation -- openstack-glance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Openstack Foundation -- openstack-glance

item.title: CVE-2016-8611|2024-08-06T02:27:41.035Z -- the%20openstack%20foundation -- openstack-glance
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Openstack Glance. No limits are enforced within the Glance image service for both v1 and v2 `/images` API POST method for authenticated users, resulting in possible denial of service attacks through database table saturation.
